title: shopify_browse_orders
humanInputs: please handle after-sales work for this e-commerce site.

items: you will retrieve new uncancelled, unfullfilled orders, and put them in a structured list of json dict data format: [{"order_id": "string", [{"product": "string", "quantity": "int"}...], "shipping_address": {"street1": "string", "street2": "string", "city": "string", "state": "string", "country": "string"}, "customer": "string", "customer_phone": "string", "ship_clickable": {"name": "string", "type": ""} ...]
For each new uncancelled, unfullfilled order, you will buy the shipping labels, reformat them, save them, and print them, and send them in messageing app.
You will handly any cancellation requests.
You will handle any return request and refund request.

you will retrieve new uncancelled, unfullfilled orders, and put them in a structured list of json dict data format: [{"order_id": "string", [{"product": "string", "quantity": "int"}...], "shipping_address": {"street1": "string", "street2": "string", "city": "string", "state": "string", "country": "string"}, "customer": "string", "customer_phone": "string", "ship_clickable": {"name": "string", "type": ""} ...]
cancellations can not be done if the order is already fullfilled.

refund on a return should only be performed after returned good reception is confirmed. 
2.1ï¼‰ If return shipping label is generated by us, with the shipping label's vendor and tracking code, we can go to that shipping label's web site and check the tracking statusw.
2.2) if the return tracking is not kown, you will need human intervention, so flag it and save the information so that later on you can make an inter-active form for human interact and confirm to you the status.

always purchase the cheapest shipping label, but do make sure the cheapest shipping service matches the product's type (for example, a cheapest shipping method shown up might be a flat envelope service, but if the order is a packaged box, this shipping service is obviously a wrong choice.), if something look confusing and you're not more than 90% certain about your choice, flag it and save it for human intervention later.
